SPEAKER:
JOSE KENNY
REPORT TITLE:
THEORETICAL MODELLING AND EXPERIMENTAL ANALYSIS OF POLYMER MATRIX NANOCOMPOSITES WITH CARBON NANOFILLERS
TALKING POINTS:

The experimental and modelling analysis of polymer matrix nanocomposites for advanced composites is reported here. In particular a case study of the theoretical and experimental analysis of the effects of the alignment of carbon nanotubes of the electrical properties of a polymer matrix for advanced composites is analysed.

This study has been supported by the Russian Ministry of Education and Science within State Contract No. 14.Z50.31.0002
